meanings.definition: A person who follows or upholds a leader, cause, or belief.
meanings.sent1: The adherents of the famous singer eagerly awaited her new album.
meanings.sent2: The political leader had many adherents who supported his policies.
meanings.sent3: The adherents of the ice cream shop were always first in line for new flavors.
meanings.sent4: Like bees to honey, the adherents flocked to the charismatic speaker's rally.
meanings.sent5: The devoted adherents of the yoga guru practiced diligently every day.

meanings.definition: A supporter or follower of a particular person, party, or set of ideas.
meanings.sent1: She was a loyal adherent of the local soccer team, attending every match.
meanings.sent2: The political party gained more adherents after their successful campaign.
meanings.sent3: The adherents of the superhero fan club proudly wore their capes to the movie premiere.
meanings.sent4: The artist's unique style attracted new adherents to her exhibitions.
meanings.sent5: The young writer found inspiration from the adherents of classic literature.
